snippet: Military leaders expressed remorse but also some resistance to policy changes in testimony before the Armed Services Committee.
abstract: Majority members of Joint Chiefs of Staff, along with other military officials, testify before Armed Services Committee about how armed services should address problem of sexual assault within its ranks; senators from both parties assessed responses, which expressed remorse but also resistance to change.
lead_paragraph: Military leaders expressed remorse but also some resistance to policy changes in testimony before the Armed Services Committee.

headline.seo: Joint Chiefs’ Testimony on Sexual Assault Dismays Senators
headline.main: Joint Chiefs’ Answers on Sex Crimes Dismay Senators
headline.print_headline: Joint Chiefs’ Answers on Sex Crimes Dismay Senators

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
